Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

Miles Example for Xbox

Discussion

The Miles SDK supplies a simple example program for Xbox that demonstrates most of the handy Miles features. To build this example in an IDE-based environment, just create a new project, include MilesXbox.CPP to the project, and then add the Miles libraries (MSSXbox.lib and MP3Xbox.lib to the project).

The Xbox example file is found in the \src\examples directory. You should also copy the "\examples\media" directory to "xe:\media" on the Xbox.
